entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Sachs Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:28 a.m. MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow and Blowing Snow, -11.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sachs Harbour Airport 1:00 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
Condition: Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -11.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -12.6°C

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late this evening then snow. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
